Docs.summary: Provides parsing support for a control. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The class object is internally created and used by the page parser when parsing the contents of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.StyleSheet> control. The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.StyleSheetControlBuilder> class recognizes inherited style classes.

Docs.permission: for operating in a hosted environment. Demand value: ; Permission value: .
